name: A B Sea Print
description: Get Ocean Aware, Learn Your A, B, Sea! A fun 'A B Sea' print for you, your kids or as a gift for anyone that loves the ocean and all the wonderful creatures it contains. 26 stylised illustrations take you through the A, B, Cs of the ocean - from the delicate Arabian Butterfly Fish all the way to the striking Zebra Shark. Donations For every print sold $5.00 is donated to the charity Ocean Conservancy. Specifications High-quality four colour litho printing on heavyweight 250gsm silk matt paper. Width 841mm (33.1") Height 594mm (23.4") Shipping Prints are rolled and shipped in a rigid cardboard tube with plastic end-caps. Estimated delivery time is 8 to 10 working days from confirmation of payment. Shipping Update We've been experiencing some delays in delivery of the poster recently with some orders taking up to 20 days to arrive. If your order is urgent or required for a particular day, please email in advance. Framing The print does not include a frame.
